mysticmod:ComboCasterPower.NAME: Combo Caster
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn add

mysticmod:DoublecastPower.NAME: Doublecast
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next [#5299DC]Spell[] card is played twice.

mysticmod:EbbPower.NAME: Ebb
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, discard 2 cards if your hand does not contain a [#5299DC]Spell[] and an [#FF5252]Arte[].

mysticmod:FlowPower.NAME: Flow
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw

mysticmod:FoxEvolutionPower.NAME: Evolution
DESCRIPTIONS: Your familiar now has an additional move

mysticmod:GainDexterityPower.NAME: Overextended
DESCRIPTIONS: Dexterity at the end of your turn.

mysticmod:GeminiFormPower.NAME: Gemini Form
DESCRIPTIONS: you play each turn, also play a random card of the other type from your draw pile.

mysticmod:HastePower.NAME: Haste
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw 1 card and gain [E] each turn.

mysticmod:MirrorEntityPower.NAME: Mirror Entity
DESCRIPTIONS: [#5299DC]Spells[] and [#FF5252]Artes[] also advance next turn's [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[] counters.

mysticmod:MomentumPower.NAME: Momentum
DESCRIPTIONS: [#5299DC]Spells[] and [#FF5252]Artes[] deal extra damage and apply extra block equal to your [#FF5252]Poise[] and [#5299DC]Power[] respectively.

mysticmod:MysticalShieldPower.NAME: Mystical Shield
DESCRIPTIONS: Block is reduced to 8 instead of 0 at the start of the turn.

mysticmod:MysticalShieldUpgradedPower.NAME: Mystical Shield
DESCRIPTIONS: Block is set to 8 instead of 0 at the start of the turn.

mysticmod:RapidCasterPower.NAME: Rapid Caster
DESCRIPTIONS: The first Cantrip you play each turn is played twice.
Cantrips you play each turn are played twice.

mysticmod:SpontaneousCasterPower.NAME: Spontaneous Caster
DESCRIPTIONS: [#5299DC]Spells[] Exhaust when played, and then generate a random [#5299DC]Spell[] in your discard pile. At the end of each turn, all [#5299DC]Spells[] are Retained.

mysticmod:StoneskinPower.NAME: Stoneskin
DESCRIPTIONS: Start your next turn with 2 extra block.
